unknown.name: Afghanistan
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who were born in Afghanistan
Visa is not required for children born to citizens of Afghanistan
Visitors arriving via military air need to legalize their stay if they wish to leave via commercial airline.
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

unknown.name: Albania
unknown.note: Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States

unknown.name: Andorra
unknown.note: The Andorran government imposes no visa requirements on its visitors and only requires a passport or European Union national identity card for entrance. However, since the country is only accessible via the Schengen countries Spain or France, entrance is not possible without entering the Schengen area first and the Schengen visa rules can therefore be regarded to apply de facto. Because Andorra is not part of the Schengen area, a multiple-entry visa is required to reenter the Schengen area when leaving Andorra

unknown.name: Angola
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for Lebanese personnel of oil companies established in Angola, provided holding a photocopy of their passport, 4 photos, and a copy of a Visa application which should be submitted by the oil company at least 2 weeks prior to arrival
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

unknown.name: Antigua and Barbuda
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States
Visa waiver fee applies for valid visa holders or residents of the United States
Departure tax applies

unknown.name: Argentina
unknown.note:
Visas are issued free of charge
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
All visitors are fingerprinted and photographed upon entry

unknown.name: Armenia
unknown.note:
Valid for 120 days
Obtainable at Zvartnots International Airport in Yerevan, Gyumri Airport, Ayrum railway station, Bagratashen, Bavra, Gogavan and Megri land borders. (Extensions of stay is possible for additional 60 days for a fee)
Obtainable online
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 180 days for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

unknown.name: Australia
unknown.note: Valid for 90 days on each visit in 12-month period if granted

unknown.name: Azerbaijan
unknown.note:
Visa is granted on arrival for holders of an official invitation letter issued by the State Migration Service of Azerbaijan or other Azerbaijan government authority
Visa is granted on arrival for staff of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and their dependents, provided holding an official invitation letter issued by the Asian Development Bank (ADB)
The form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission
Electronic Visa is granted through approved travel agencies
Applicants of Armenian ancestry or with Armenian visas in their passport may not obtain a visa
Registration with the local police upon arrival is mandatory

unknown.name: The Bahamas

unknown.name: Bahrain
unknown.note:
Visa is granted on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

Valid for 3 or 6 months, fees may vary accordingly
Obtainable at Entebbe Airport in Kampala
Obtainable online
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

unknown.name: Ukraine
unknown.note: Visa is not required for passengers under 18 year of age provided their name is mentioned in parent/guardian's visa

unknown.name: United Arab Emirates
unknown.note:
Visa is granted on arrival for residents of GCC member states for a maximum stay of 1 month
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 3 months within 6 months for a fee
96-hour transit visa is granted on arrival at Dubai International Airport (DXB) provided the transit time is at least 8 hours, provided holding onward tickets to a third country, and holding a passport valid for at least 6 months
Visas is granted online if arriving on Air Arabia, Emirates, Etihad, Air Baltic, Air Berlin, Air Serbia, and flydubai.
Electronic Visas is granted online via www.ednrd.ae if residing in one of the 5 other GCC countries
Iris scan taken upon entry

unknown.name: United States
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for holders of a Form I-512 (Authorization for Parole of an Alien into the United States")
May apply online for non-immigrant visas (DS-160). However, the applicant must attend a scheduled interview at the nearest US Embassy or Consulate
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

unknown.name: Uruguay
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who were born in Uruguay
Visa is not required for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

unknown.name: Uzbekistan
unknown.note:
The form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission
Visa is granted on arrival at Tashkent (TAS) Airport for holders of a Visa Confirmation stamp and 2 passport photos
Registration with the local police within 3 days of arrival is mandatory

unknown.name: Venezuela
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
All visa applications must be submitted in person, and all applicants will be interviewed at the diplomatic mission.

unknown.name: Vietnam
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 30 days at Phu Quoc (PQC) Airport
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for holders a Certificate of Visa Exemption issued to former citizens of Vietnam residing abroad
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for citizens of Vietnam, provided not holding a Vietnamese passport but only holding a foreign permanent residence permit
Visa is granted on arrival at Hanoi (HAN) Airport for holders of a pre-approval letter issued by the Vietnamese Immigration (Ministry of Public Security)
Visa is granted on arrival at Hanoi (HAN), Ho Chi Minh City (SGN), or Da Nang (DAD) airports for holders of a pre-approval letter issued by the Consular Department (Ministry of Foreign Affairs) for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months
Pre-arranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phu Quoc or Da Nang airports

unknown.name: Yemen
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon, being of Yemeni origin
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Registration with the local police is mandatory

unknown.name: Zambia
unknown.note:
Visa is not required for minors if they are mentioned in the passport of one of their parents
Holders of passports without 2 blank pages may be refused entry
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

unknown.name: Zimbabwe
unknown.note:
Granted for tourism purposes only, visitors holding a valid Visa or eVisa are strictly prohibited from engaging in business activities and should obtain a business visa should they intend to do so
Visa is granted on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
